themes: absence of trust and sustained engagement
key_phrases: complex application processes that favor organizations with professional grant writers
limited outreach to communities not already plugged into city channels
lack of culturally relevant support services
smaller or grassroots groups often lack the infrastructure to meet administrative requirements
sustain long timelines between application and funding
disconnect between institutional language and the way many underrepresented communities talk about their work
trust, clarity, and sustained engagement are still missing
barriers_identified: favoritism toward organizations with professional grant writers
lack of culturally relevant support services
insufficient infrastructure for smaller or grassroots groups
long timelines between application and funding
disconnect in language between institutions and underrepresented communities
lack of trust, clarity, and sustained engagement
